data.code_commit_message:
feat(ANEM): Phase 4: ALU and register bank fixes

- Fix SLT to use signed comparison (was unsigned)
- Add SGT (Set Greater Than) instruction with signed comparison
- Remove SUBCK delayed-clock anti-pattern from register bank
- Eliminate REG_IN_DATA intermediate buffer, write directly to REG_DATA
- Add SLT/SGT signed comparison tests (tests 11-12)

All 12 tests pass.
